Posts.Content: thank you, yes, it helps.........just to talk to someone with the experience, isn't the waiting just pure torture? the dr. also prescribed valium for me to take before the procedure, he said, I have to be very still, how long did yours take?
Posts.Title: scared, please help

Posts.Content: I had a mammogram about a month ago, it came back with 2 areas of concern, I had the 2nd mammogram and ultrasound, same thing, I had an apt. yesterday with a surgeon and I'm having a stereotactic biopsy in a week, then another 2-3 days wait for results. The waiting is the hardest thing, I can't concentrate at all and am exhausted from trying to be brave. I'm 48 yrs. old and have no breast cancer history in my family, so I know I have that on my side, its just the not knowing for sure. I'm scared...... Any advice from someone thats been there?
Posts.Title: scared, please help

Posts.Content: I finally got my results today, benign!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! woooooooohooooooooooo The waiting is such an awful thing, thanks to all who answered me with good advice!
Posts.Title: scared, please help
